It was Saturday morning at around 10 am, you and Sarah were the only ones home. The parents were at work and your five year old sister Samantha was at day camp. It was a cool fall morning when you wake up inside one of the Body Swap Machine pods. You see someone opening your pod door.

"Time to taste a little of you're own medicine Nick!" Said Sarah in your body

You begin to think to yourself "Oh no! This gender bender machine actually works and I'm trapped inside my sister's body?!?!"

You look down at your new body, your wearing pink pajama pants and slippers while Sarah is in your body wearing you're blue pajama pants and slides.

Sarah in your body: "Listen this is how this is going down we are telling NO ONE about this machine, we swapped bodies or anything what just happened! We are gonna live inside each others bodies for a few days then switch back so enjoy this experience and learn a lesson. Deal?"

You in Sarah's body: "Deal!"

Sarah in your body: "Now I would enjoy being comfortable for the rest of the weekend because after school on Monday you have cheer leading practice, have fun!"

1143.content:
John shows up in the door clapping his hands slowly. "Good job "Nick". All is going to how we planned." john said.

"Yup." Sam smiled in your body.

"Huh? What are you talking about John?" You asked confused in Sam's body.

"Well "Sam". You see me and your former sister were sick of being stuck as the younger siblings until we found this machine." John said.

"So what's your plan John?" You asked.

"I thought it would be obvious to by now but maybe you've gotten dumber in Sam's-wait! Your new body." John said.

"Hey I'm not stupid!" You yelled in your new little girl voice.

"Then you should figure out what we are planning." Sam smiled.

"Argh! Just tell me what it is!" You yelled.

"I plan to take Sarah's body so then we are the older siblings and you and Sarah are the younger siblings." John smirked.

"Wait why do you want Sarah's body and not mine since your a boy John?" You asked.

"Well Sam and I thought it would interesting to be the other sex while we steal your bodies and we can just switch between you two anytime we want so it's not like I'll be stuck as a girl forever." He smirked.

"I won't let you do this. I'll go run and tell Sarah before it's too late!" You yelled as you started running away in Sam's body.

"Stop him "Nick" and bring him back here! John yelled.

Sam as fast as she could in your body and was easily able to stop you in her body from going any further.

"I'm sorry little sister but I can't have you ruining this!" Sam said in your body as she grabbed you and brought you back to the pods where John was waiting with rope and ducktape.

"I really didn't want to have do this Sam if you just went with our plan but you left me no choice." John said as "Nick" held you down while John duck taped your mouth as you tried to scream then he proceed to tie up your body so you couldn't move.

"Now if you don't behave then we have no choice then to resort making this even worse for you." John smirked.

"Nick I'm going to get Sarah so I can swap with her. Keep an eye on Sam until this is all over. And when you hear the machine go off bring Sam in." John said as he went to go look for Sarah.
